title: Generation rate of hospital solid waste from different services: A case study in the province of Bagua, northern Peru
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Juan Eduardo Suarez Rivadeneira, Eduardo Benjamín Suarez Chavarry, Ítalo Maldonado Ramirez, Wilfredo Ruiz Camacho, Edilbrando Vega Calderón, Roberto Pérez Astonitas, Roberto Carlos Santa Cruz Acosta, Morales-Rojas Eli, Heling Kristtel Masgo Ventura, Mayra Pamela Musayón Díaz
